name: Maza
storyline:
Our days. Moscow. Brother and sister are increasingly starting a scandal about an old apartment in the center, which costs quite a lot. The sister’s husband intensifies the situation and, in the end, forces our hero, Oleg Mazapov, to go in search of money to buy out her share and save the apartment. But everything was not as simple as he expected...

In the role of Oleg Mazapov, you will have to follow the path of making money and get out of the problems that stand in your way!

- Classic Point and Click gameplay

- Saves are exist

- Lots of memes and references to reality

- Pumping up score
summary: The protagonist does not want to lose his home because of the ambitions of his sister and her cynical husband! Oleg Mazapov wants to get the required amount of money to solve his housing problem, but it turns into unexpected consequences...
